dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Take a gander at that mug. I ain't ever seen someone so adept-looking my whole life.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: You don't seem like the usual pigeons we pluck. No offense, of course, if you ARE a Byzantium gold-blood.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Say, I'd like to do you a favor. Might I interest you in a surefire scheme? Wink, wink.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Did you just say "wink" at me... instead of actually winking?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Cross your arms.> This ought to be good.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I don't have time for this.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Don't believe I did, no. Wink.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Pure and simple it's like this - I run our drug delivery service. Recently, I had the genius idea to cut costs in half by swapping our auto loaders with faster, cheaper sprats.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Let me guess, we pocket the half you save?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That *is* a genius idea.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That's a stroke of sheer brilliance.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Too right, you are. Only problem is my sprat carriers ain't arrived from their latest run.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: As I was saying, you look more capable than most of the hoopleheads around these parts. What say you locate 'em and retrieve the goods for me?

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: In return, I'll cut you five percent of the profit.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Make it thirty-five plus a sample of the goods, and you've got a deal. Wink.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Before I agree to this, I want some questions answered.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Not interested.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Thirty - ?! Thirty-five percent?! Are you -?! Are you out of your gourd?!

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: If I wasn't recovering from a bout of Morgellons, I wouldn't stand for this. But things are what they are so... I'll agree to it. But not half a percent more!

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: My sprat carriers scurry back and forth through the shipping tunnels. Any trail ought to start there. When you've got the goods, I'll be here.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Hit me. I won't even hit back.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What do you do around here?

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Officially, I keep the books for Ms. Malin, provide loans to the Byzantium gold-bloods for gaming, and oversee our drug-running operations.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Speaking of... might I interest you in a purchase? I'll give you a first-time discount. That's five percent off and a free drink at the Ante Up. You're welcome.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll pass.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Suit yourself.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Well, my ma always did say, you want any dealing done right, you got to do it yourself.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: See? I know a fellow genius when I clap eyes on 'em.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Oh, I enjoy a good challenge. I'll get right to it then.
